attributes.action: scrap the idea of bin tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having the highest taxes on earth should be enough for any government, but ours seems to love taxing us. Just recently, Mr brown raised the air tax. While we are paying council tax it is not acceptable to talk about a bin tax, why do we then pay our council tax for? I for one have had enough from this governments tax'ing policy. Do we all have to move abroad just to live in peace? scrap the proposed bintax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
